6 Months
Complete Your Options Trading Journey

Step 1: Build Your Foundation

Master 40+ essential concepts across 6 critical areas of options trading

Options Basics

  • Call & Put Options
  • Strike Price & Expiry
  • Intrinsic & Time Value
  • Moneyness
  • Options Chain
  • Premium & Payoff
  • Exercise & Assignment

Greeks

  • Delta & Gamma
  • Theta Decay
  • Vega & Volatility
  • Rho & Interest Rates
  • Greeks Interaction
  • Portfolio Greeks

Strategies

  • Long Call/Put
  • Short Call/Put
  • Covered Call
  • Protective Put
  • Bull/Bear Spreads
  • Iron Condor
  • Straddle/Strangle
  • Butterfly Spreads

Risk Management

  • Position Sizing
  • Stop Loss Rules
  • Portfolio Allocation
  • Max Risk Per Trade
  • Correlation Risk
  • Liquidity Risk

Psychology

  • Discipline & Patience
  • Emotional Control
  • FOMO Management
  • Loss Acceptance
  • Profit Taking
  • Consistency Focus

Automation

  • Algo Trading Basics
  • API Integration
  • Strategy Backtesting
  • Risk Parameters
  • Order Management
  • Performance Tracking

Step 2: Training Before Market Entry

Practice and perfect your skills with professional-grade tools

Backtesting

Test your strategies on historical data before risking real money

  • Historical Data Analysis
  • Strategy Performance Metrics
  • Risk-Reward Optimization
  • Market Condition Testing

Paper Trading

Practice with real market data without financial risk

  • Live Market Simulation
  • Real-time Order Execution
  • Portfolio Tracking
  • Performance Analysis

Trade Automation

Learn to automate strategies with Sensibull, Opstra & Algo tools

  • Strategy Automation
  • Risk Management Rules
  • Alert Systems
  • Performance Monitoring

Step 3: Real Mentorship

No tips, no calls - only structured guidance for disciplined trading

Mentor Philosophy

Discipline Over Profits

We focus on building consistent, disciplined trading habits rather than chasing quick profits.

Edge-Based Trading

Learn to identify and exploit statistical edges in the market through systematic approaches.

Risk-First Mindset

Every strategy begins with risk management, not profit potential.

What You Get

Weekly Sunday Calls
Every Sunday 10 AM for 6 months
Personal Trading Plan
Customized strategy based on your risk profile
Psychology & Discipline
Mental frameworks for consistent execution
Performance Review
Regular analysis of your trading decisions

"No tips, no calls - only structured guidance to make you an independent, disciplined trader."
